Texts.Eng: Great. Did you harvest your crops yet? Do that, if not. Also, take these ^orange;buckets^white; for the next step.

Next, you'll need to make ^green;yeast water^white;. Use ^orange;water^white; and ^orange;wheat^white; in the Mashing Tun to make 3 Grain Water. Use ^orange;sugar^white; with the grain water in the mashing tun to make Yeast Water.
